name: Pimp My Robot
description:
You are helping your old college friend in his robot factory in a simple task of assembling robots through the workshop. However, your friend pulled an oopsie and ordered new parts and paint for his new sets of robots he was going to start working on the next week. Now it is up to you to figure out how you will go through the day producing robots. 

Can you survive the hectic environment as confusing orders come and go through your workshop?

Programming -  Junle Yuan,Omar Alkharji, Logan Flansaas

Artwork - Minmini Sanganathan, Omar Alkharji

Sound Effects - Minmini Sanganathan, Junle Yuan
